info.title: Quikstor ThirdParty
info.description: Quickstor Cloud API - Third Party Access Documentation

200.description: API responses with the TokenResponse model(See models.)

requestBody.description: Raw text body required for authentication

post.description: Get an access token from API test

200.description:
API reponds to the Site model. 

See (https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/Site)

get.description: A client can consume the array of the information for the sites(facilities) that is integrated with the partner.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

200.description:
API reponds to the Site model. 

Response model for getUnitTypes can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/UnitType

get.description:
GetAvailableUnitTypes is an endpoint related to types of units that are vacant and available to be rented by the facility. 

To request getAvailableUnitType endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId.

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).
Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"
parameters.name: Authorization

200.description:
API reponds to the Site, Picture and Feature models. 

Response model for GetAvailableUnitTypes can be viewed below:
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/UnitType

get.description:
GetAvailableUnitTypes is an endpoint related to types of units that are vacant and available to be rented by the facility. 

To request getAvailableUnitType endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId.

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

200.description:
Response model for getUnits can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/Unit

get.description:
GetUnits is an endpoint that responds to a collection of objects related to all units belonging to the facility whether they're being occupied or available.

To request getUnits endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

200.description:
Response model for getTenants can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/Tenant

get.description:
GetTenants is an endpoint related to all tenant's information belonging to a unit in the facility. 

To request getTenants endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: To filter tenants based on the move-in date by passing fromDate parameters.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: To filter tenants based on the move-in date by passing toDate parameters.

200.description:
Response model for getInventoryItems can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/InventoryItem

get.description:
GetInventoryItems is an endpoint related to all inventory items located in the facility. 

To request getInventoryItems endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

200.description:
Response model for getReservations can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/Reservation

get.description:
GetReservations is an endpoint that's related to all reservations information belonging to the facility.

To request getReservations endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

200.description:
Response model for getReservationDetails can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/Reservation

get.description:
GetReservationDetails is an endpoint that's related to the detailed information of all reservations belonging to the facility. 

To request getReservationDetail endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId and reservationId.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

parameters.name: reservationId
parameters.description: ReservationId can be retrieved from getReservations endpoint (Reservation Model Id).

200.description:
Response model for getSpecialsForUnitType can be viewed below: 
https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/Special

get.description:
GetSpecialsForUnitType is an endpoint that's related to all the specials created for each type of units belonging to the facility. 

To request getSpecialsForUnitType endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId and unitTypeId.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (Site Model Id).

parameters.name: unitTypeId
parameters.description: UnitTypeId can be retrieved from getUnits endpoint (Unit Model Id).

post.description: The MoveIn POST endpoint is used to request data from ther server to identify all tenants moving into the facility.

post.description: The createReservation POST endpoint is used to request data to create a new reservation for new tenants for a facility.

requestBody.description: The createReservation body are required data parameters that neeeds to be passed in order to create a new reservation.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

requestBody.description: The editReservation body are required parameters to update/edit data for an existing reserved tenants.

put.description: The editReservation PUT endpoint is used to update/edit data to existing reserved future tenants for a facility.
